page.title: 08HOME LIFE_WEEKEND
page.content: SATURDAY MORNINGS ARE DIFFERENT IN OUR HOME.THERE BEING NO SCHOOL THERE IS TIME FOR EARLY MORNING TEA SO BREAKFAST IS LATER,THEN I GET WASHED AND DRESSED.NEXT I GO OUT ON MY BIKE WITH MY FRIENDS OR SOMETIMES PLAY FOOTBALL,THEN COME HOME FOR DINNER.AT ABOUT 2 O'CLOCK,IF PLYMOUTH ARGYLE ARE PLAYING AT HOME MY DAD,MY BROTHER,HIS FRIEND AND I GET IN THE CAR AND GO TO HOME PARK.AFTER THE MATCH WE COME HOME FOR TEA.AS SOON AS TEA IS FINISHED I GO OUT ON MY BIKE UNTIL 8 O'CLOCK WHEN I AM ALLOWED TO WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL 9 O'CLOCK,WHEN I GO TO BED. IN THE SUMMER INSTEAD OF GOING TO FOOTBALL,WE GO OUT IN THE CAR TO THE COUNTRY OR TO THE SEASIDE.
